name: Dart or Die
description:
The mad scientists failed their experiment and are under attack by the monster they created! In order to survive, they must fight their way out using limited resources and weapons, who is going to be the last ones standing? The monsters or the scientists?

-Free to play
-Shadow art graphic style
-Easy to learn touch control
-Tons of unique scientific monsters
-Evolving combat weapons
-More than a hundred levels
